summary: The newest, and best, ENB in my trilogy!
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[size=5][b][u]BAWAR ENB[/u][/b]
[/size]
[u]
[i][size=3]This is the very best ENB that I have ever made. [/size][/i][/u][size=3]

It is bright, yet subtle; It's charismatic, yet bold; and above all, it looks amazing!

If you don't know, I have made three other ENB's for skyrim, and all of them have received an incredible amount of applause from nexus - which I am eternally grateful for- But this ENB is just amazing - It's performance friendly, looks incredible, and will cater for all your graphical needs.
[color=#ff0000]
[i][b]BAWAR ENB currently has two versions - Original, and Performance! ( original is of a higher graphical quality, but performance gives you much more fps! )[/b][/i][/color]
[/size]
[youtube]SQjTD3aFv8g[/youtube]

[youtube]_qBVv1PRZsM[/youtube]

[youtube]cjAQa9hY6l0[/youtube]
[u][font=Tahoma]
[/font][/u][font=Tahoma][color=#ff0000][b][i]I recommend turning your brightness up all the way for this ENB to look the best! (see screenshots of horses / winterhold) 
[/i][/b][/color][/font]
[font=Georgia]Mods that I use:[/font]

[font=Georgia]Extreme Grass[/font]
[font=Georgia]Skyrim HD[/font]
[font=Georgia]4k textures [/font]
[font=Georgia]Realistic water two + watercolour for ENB[/font]
[font=Georgia]Skyrim Bigger Trees[/font]
[font=Georgia]Real Clouds[/font]
[font=Georgia]Vivid Clouds and fogs[/font]
[font=Georgia]Realistic Lighting Overhaul[/font]
[font=Georgia]Realistic Aspen Trees[/font]
[font=Georgia]Climates of Tamriel V[/font]
[font=Georgia]Seasons of Skyrim Springtime overhaul[/font]
[font=Georgia]Ultimate Lush Overhaul[/font]
[font=Georgia]4k parallax mountains[/font]


[font=Georgia]INSTALLATION:[/font]

[youtube]RlaXt7FctP0[/youtube]
[font=Georgia]ENB Series v0.308 (most current ENB), please download the binary files from here: [/font][i]http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0308.htm 
[/i]
[font=Georgia]- Extract [/font][b]d3d9.dll[/b][font=Georgia] to your Skyrim folder. (Remove the dll file and try the InjectorVersion if you have any problems with the WrapperVersion - which you shouldnt do, but still, just in case)[/font]

[font=Georgia]- Download my mod and extract the files to your Skyrim folder (where TESV.exe is located), and overwrite if asked.[/font]

[font=Georgia]NOTE: For the Climates Of Tamriel versions, the contents of the Data folder should be copied to your Skyrim/Data folder.[/font]

[font=Georgia]- Open your SkyrimPrefs.ini file located in your "My Documents" folder and make sure these lines are set:[/font]

[font=Georgia]bFloatPointRenderTarget=1[/font]
[font=Georgia]bDrawLandShadows=1[/font]
[font=Georgia]bTreesReceiveShadows=1[/font]
[font=Georgia]iBlurDeferredShadowMask=5 [/font]

[font=Georgia]- Open enblocal.ini and set the VideoMemorySizeMb parameter (e.g. VRAM + RAM - 2048)[/font]

[font=Georgia]- Disable AA in the SkyrimLauncher options[/font]

[font=Georgia]      Many thanks, you awesome people![/font]

[size=3]  -BAWAR[/size]
[/center]
author: Bawar
